entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023
